scripts.dist:Proxy: npm run Proxy.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize Proxy.full.sol && mv Proxy_full_sol_MainnetProxy.abi Proxy.full.abi && mv Proxy_full_sol_MainnetProxy.bin Proxy.full.bin && rm -rf Proxy_full_sol*
scripts.dist:ZeroPool: npm run ZeroPool.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize ZeroPool.full.sol && mv ZeroPool_full_sol_Zeropool.abi ZeroPool.full.abi && mv ZeroPool_full_sol_Zeropool.bin ZeroPool.full.bin && rm -rf ZeroPool_full_sol*
scripts.dist:ZeroPoolSidechain: npm run ZeroPoolSidechain.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize ZeroPoolSidechain.full.sol && mv ZeroPoolSidechain_full_sol_ZeropoolSidechain.abi ZeroPoolSidechain.full.abi && mv ZeroPoolSidechain_full_sol_ZeropoolSidechain.bin ZeroPoolSidechain.full.bin && rm -rf ZeroPoolSidechain_full_sol*
scripts.dist: npm run dist:Proxy && npm run dist:ZeroPool && npm run dist:ZeroPoolSidechain
